body_html:
Does the script give the wrong path?

In pr/caffe2-py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-test:
08:07:21 ERROR: file not found: /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python

In py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-build:
08:01:37 + sudo ln -sf /usr/local/caffe2/caffe2 /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages

The failures of pr/caffe2-conda2-ubuntu16.04-test and pr/caffe2-py2-cuda9.0-cudnn7-windows-build should not be caused by this PR.
body_text:
Does the script give the wrong path?
In pr/caffe2-py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-test:
08:07:21 ERROR: file not found: /usr/local/caffe2/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python
In py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-build:
08:01:37 + sudo ln -sf /usr/local/caffe2/caffe2   /usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages
The failures of pr/caffe2-conda2-ubuntu16.04-test and pr/caffe2-py2-cuda9.0-cudnn7-windows-build should not be caused by this PR.
body:
Does the script give the wrong path?

In pr/caffe2-py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-test:
08:07:21 ERROR: file not found: /usr/local/**caffe2**/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/caffe2/python

In py2-mkl-ubuntu16.04-build:
08:01:37 + sudo ln -sf /usr/local/caffe2/caffe2   **/usr/local/lib/python2.7/dist-packages**

The failures of pr/caffe2-conda2-ubuntu16.04-test and pr/caffe2-py2-cuda9.0-cudnn7-windows-build should not be caused by this PR.
